content: meet millie the cow adorable crochet cow pattern that you will love to crochet perfect to make for a gift or you may find she is way too cute to give away and you need to keep her for yourself i won t tell pattern includes detailed instructions on how to make the cow construct and assemble cow for that adorable look you love materials needed - worsted weight yarn exact brand and color provided - crochet hook size g - fiberfill - 12mm safety eyes - tapestry needle yarn weight and gauge does not need to be exact just adjust hook size for your chosen yarn cow shown is approximately 13 5 tall from top of head to bottom of feet pattern is written in english using standard american terms level advanced beginner/intermediate pattern will be available for instant download upon payment the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet 365 knit too this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase
